channel.title: Orphaned case error i could understand on the help page

item.title: Orphaned case error i could understand on the help page
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

kill boy 98:

so that worked but the npcs wont talk

Go to DialogueHandler and create a dialogue (which is in a case form also, so your screwed) and use the number you put in ActionHandler (e.g sendDialougues(#, i) use that number for the case in DialogueHandler.

Example:

case 113:
sendNpcChat4( inside this add your dialogue adding apostrophes and commas where necessary, and don’t forget to close this or you’ll hit errors.

Then (obviously) add your break; signifying this case is closing.

Now if you want to add a Dialogue where the player can talk back to the npc with options (e.g “Yes” “No”) Then you do sendOption and so on. I’m just trying to give you an idea, I don’t wanna spoonfeed, it will spoil you.

Read full topic
item.source: Orphaned case error i could understand on the help page

item.title: Orphaned case error i could understand on the help page
item.dc:creator: @kill_boy_98 kill boy 98
item.description:
@kill_boy_98 wrote:

well i was adding some code and got the error error: orphaned case case 949: ^

i looked how to fix it and i could understand could soemone help me plz

theis is the code i added case 949: if (c.tutorial == 4) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(113, i); c.tutorial = 5; } else { c.sendMessage("Head down the ladder to go to your next tutor!"); } break;
